means: International Reference Organization in Forensic Medicine and Sciences 法医学与法庭辩护学国际咨询组织

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词都有"通知，告知"之意。
means: inform ： 普通用词，指传达事实或信息，或指经过研究或调查而获得的事实或信息。
acquaint ： 指提供有关信息或情况使某人熟悉某些过程或复杂的情况。
notify ： 指正式通知需要注意的事情。
advise ： 指正式通知某件重要事，所通知的事情与被通知的人有关。

sentence.Network_en: Teachers inform me that Tracey's behaviour has improved no end.
sentence.Network_cn: 老师们告诉我特雷西的行为大有改善。

sentence.Network_en: The concept of the Rose continued to inform the poet's work.
sentence.Network_cn: 玫瑰的概念持续贯穿于诗人的作品中。

sentence.Network_en: We simply want to inform people objectively about events.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们只是想如实地向人们通报事件情况。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English enforme, informe 'give form or shape to', also 'form the mind of, teach', from Old French enfourmer, from Latin informare 'shape, fashion, describe', from in- 'into' + forma 'a form'

entry.def: If you inform someone of something, you tell them about it.

example.ex: They would inform him of any progress they had made...
example.tran: 他们会把他们取得的任何进步都告诉他。

example.ex: My daughter informed me that she was pregnant...
example.tran: 我女儿告诉我她怀孕了。

entry.def: If someone informs on a person, they give information about the person to the police or another authority, which causes the person to be suspected or proved guilty of doing something bad.

example.ex: Somebody must have informed on us...
Thousands of American citizens have informed on these organized crime syndicates.
example.tran: 数以千计的美国公民检举过这些有组织的犯罪团伙。

entry.tran: 赋(思想或特质)于;渗透入
entry.def: If a situation or activity is informed by an idea or a quality, that idea or quality is very noticeable in it.

example.ex: All great songs are informed by a certain sadness and tension...
example.tran: 所有很棒的歌曲都透着某种悲伤和张力。

example.ex: The concept of the Rose continued to inform the poet's work.
example.tran: 玫瑰的概念持续贯穿于诗人的作品中。

means.word_mean: 1. impart knowledge of some fact, state or affairs, or event to;

sentences.sentence: "She had informed on her own parents for years"

auth_sentence.content: Please inform the Box Office when you book tickets.
auth_sentence.res_content: Please inform the Box Office when you book tickets.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Please inform the Box Office when you book tickets.

auth_sentence.content: So, let me inform those who understand this.
auth_sentence.res_content: So, let me inform those who understand this.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So, let me inform those who understand this.

auth_sentence.content: It feels only right to inform him of this.
auth_sentence.res_content: It feels only right to inform him of this.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It feels only right to inform him of this.

Sentence.sentence: Yes, I wonder when I'll be informed about my application for the job.
When he will be informed about his application
Inform him of the arrangements for his trip in Italy.
The other's portrayal of Muir's life is a testimony to what it means to be lifelong learners and to use that learning to inform and bring about change
To inform him of a problem they face
The dry statistics ought to inform the ongoing deficit debate, because a budget is not just a catalog of programs and taxes.

sentences.en: Can you inform me when to begin our final examination?
sentences.cn: 你能告诉我们什么时候期终考试吗?

sentences.en: The boss asked his secretary to keep him well informed of the programme's progress.
sentences.cn: 老板要求秘书随时向他报告计划的进展情况。

means.word_mean: 使充满，使弥漫(常与with连用)

sentences.en: A love of nature informed his writing.
sentences.cn: 在他的著作中充满着对自然的爱。

sentences.en: It informs everything that happens after.
sentences.cn: 它预示了后来发生的一切。

jushi.english: If you know the answer, inform me.
jushi.chinese: 如果你知道答案,告诉我。

jushi.english: If you saw the accident please inform the police.
jushi.chinese: 如果你看见那次事故的发生,请你报告警察。

jushi.english: Please inform us how to find Dr. Brown's house.
jushi.chinese: 请告诉我们怎样才能找到布朗医生的家。
